bibl.title: The Sarmatian and the Indians. A New Satirical Epigram on the Victory Titles of Galerius.
bibl.note: P. Yale Inv. 4000 ined. (fourth-century papyrus codex, containing portions of approximately 60 Greek epigrams), page 11, lines 27-35. The editio princeps will appear as American Studies in Papyrology, vol. 52, with the tentative title New Epigrams of Palladas: A Fragmentary Papyrus Codex (P. CtYBR inv. 4000). - Introduction. - The Epigram in Historical Context. - The Epigram as Historical Source. - Coda: Date of Composition. - Pp. 50-52: Appendix: Iterations of the Imperial Victory Title Sarmaticus Maximus [Nos 1-16].
bibl.seg: Wilkinson Kevin W., The Sarmatian and the Indians. A New Satirical Epigram on the Victory Titles of Galerius.

P. Yale Inv. 4000 ined. (fourth-century papyrus codex, containing portions of approximately 60 Greek epigrams), page 11, lines 27-35. The editio princeps will appear as American Studies in Papyrology, vol. 52, with the tentative title New Epigrams of Palladas: A Fragmentary Papyrus Codex (P.
